title: February
description: On New Year's Eve Cal is chased down the street by a staggering, sick man with a deadly They killed your father, they'll kill you--you must survive the next 365 days; hurled into a life on the run, the 15-year-old fugitive must somehow uncover the truth about his father's mysterious death and a history changing secret. A new series of 12 books, one publishing each month for 12 months.
author: Gabrielle Lord
